custom-action.name: command_line
custom-action.description:
Launches a program on the Load Generator machine. Jars and resources copied under the 'custom-resources' folder of the project are automatically copied to all Load Generators. Use the variable '${NL-CustomResources}' to access the synchronized folder on the Load Generator.
Possible parameters are: - command: The command to launch or program executable file - argX: Command argument number X (eg: arg1, arg2, ...) - charset: The charset used by the console. Default platform charset is used if not set. - closeInput: close the input after launching the cmd process, it allows to execute powershell commands.
